main.name: Chinmay P
main.bio: Hi there! I am Chinmay! I've been coding for over 1 year now. As a Developer I've worked With Startups to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. Through live coaching sessions on Youtube, I have accumulated several views demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development.

work.title: Freelance Developer & YouTuber Teacher
work.description: Can Help With Many Aspects Of Programming With Web, Mobile & Game Development, Data Science & Machine Learning, Cloud Computing & Network Engineering

testimonials.text: Chinmay is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Chinmay has been AWESOME, he makes learning Programming  so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
